mapper.update:
UPDATE gmair_machine.machine_efficient_information
last_confirm_time = #{lastConfirmTime},
running = #{running},
conti = #{conti},
abnormal= #{abnormal},
block_flag = #{blockFlag},
qr_code = #{qrcode}
WHERE qr_code = #{qrcode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gmair_machine.machine_efficient_information (qr_code, last_confirm_time, running, conti, abnormal, block_flag, create_time) VALUES (#{qrcode}, #{lastConfirmTime}, #{running}, #{conti}, #{abnormal}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})
